item.description:
DVD 1 of a set of 3 will be shown, as part of the introductory information to lay the foundation to understand the details of  Silver Seed healing.   The group moderator has already been using Silver Seed technologies presented at workshops even though this information had not yet been available in book form. 

The book contains other pertinent info, as suggested by its title "2012 – Life After Earth: Orb Whisperers and the Silver Seed Awakening".

The set of DVD's comes in a case which has the same photo as the cover of the book described on the link below, which is by the same author:

http://www.azuritepress.com/products_us/ar_b.php

Those who order the book will find this very useful also. 

But the DVD's are definately a "MUST SEE" for those who have been curious to know about angels and other types of phenomena which (before this) have remained shrouded in mystery.
item.how_to_find_us: Go up driveway with Meetup sign, and enter the front door which has another Meetup sign, and go on downstairs.
item.why: We will be viewing and discussing a DVD called Angelic Realities. presented by Adashi MCEO LLC in conjuction with the Azurite Press MCEO, Inc. This includes technical info about higher dimensions, Angels, and various forms of contact, including ET's.

group.name: Indigo Insights: Awakening to our Full Potential

item.name: Angelic Realities
